blockers.description: PostHog limitations discovered when adding early access features
blockers.impact: Beta features UI reverted site to 3-month-old look
blockers.action_required: Meeting with PostHog today; Rob getting clarity from Adam/Jason/Ben by EOD

blockers.description: No clear graduation criteria defined for feature stages
blockers.impact: Can't answer 'what is success criteria to move from alpha to beta?'

next_action: Rob to get clarification on feature flag/release stages by EOD (Adam, Jason, Ben)

council_notes_20260124.key_quote: The true clarity and delineations that we talked about last time that is the expectation for this isn't there yet.
council_notes_20260124.status_note: Bricks being laid daily but no features in defined alpha/beta stages yet
